short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate and display estimated trip costs in Google Maps based on distance, fuel price, and vehicle mileage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trip Cost Calculator for Google Maps

Enhance your travel planning by seeing trip costs directly in Google Maps. This extension calculates and displays the estimated cost based on your vehicle's mileage and current fuel prices.

Features:

•  Automatically calculates trip costs for driving routes.
•  Displays the cost next to the distance in Google Maps.
•  Customizable settings for fuel price and vehicle mileage.

How to Use:

• Install the Extension:
• Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
• Set Fuel Price and Mileage:
    • Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
    • Enter your vehicle's mileage and the current fuel price.
    • Save your settings.
• View Trip Costs in Google Maps:
• Open Google Maps and get directions.
• The trip cost will appear next to the distance for each route.

Make informed travel decisions with the Trip Paisa for Google Maps!
